snippet: Defensive end Robert Nkemdiche created a national stir when he said he might consider attending another university if Clemson did not offer a scholarship to a close friend and teammate.
abstract: Nation's top football recruit Robert Nkemdiche creates a national stir by saying he may consider attending another university if Clemson does not offer a scholarship to his high school friend and teammate Ryan Carter; traditionalists quickly denounce Nkemdiche, but others, including some who have called for the NCAA to compensate its athletes, rise to defend the idea of a recruit attempting to capitalize on his market value.
lead_paragraph: Defensive end Robert Nkemdiche created a national stir when he said he might consider attending another university if Clemson did not offer a scholarship to a close friend and teammate.

headline.seo: Robert Nkemdiche, Top Football Recruit, Sparks a Debate With a Request
